attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As more and more foriegners are allowed to enter the Thai house / land market. This raises land / house prices.

This is forcing locals out of the market and giving them an unsecure future.

Urge the government to have direct talks when the new Thai government is annouced to purge the land sales market, enforce a competitive market for Thai nationals and look after Thai nationals rather than sell to 'farang'.

rejection.details: Please enter an explicit action for HM Government in the main sentence
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
